chunks.chunk_text: 想知道薪水入帳後該如何管理投資新手又該何時入場出國旅遊怎麼玩追什麼我是蔡尚樺邀請您來收聽玉山銀行全新Podcast玉山學堂在這裡我將和不同世代的來賓一起聊投資談消費分享最實用的理財觀念讓理財不只是數字而是更輕鬆更有趣的生活方式現在就點擊連結收聽一起開啟幸福人生
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科學研究相關時事趣聞 2023 All about scientific research.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello 同情家族歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家與主題的熱門跟讀文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界史詩曲文Let's get right to it
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科學研究相關時事趣聞 2023 All about scientific research.json

chunks.chunk_text: Evidence in humans suggests a type of Western high-fat, high-sugar junk food diet can quickly undermine your brain's appetite control.After indulging in a week-long binge of waffles, milkshakes and similarly rich foods, researchers in Australia found young and healthy volunteers scored worse on memory tests and experienced a greater desire to eat junk food even when they were already full.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科學研究相關時事趣聞 2023 All about scientific research.json

chunks.chunk_text: The findings suggest something is amiss in the hippocampus, a region of the brain that supports memory and helps to regulate appetite.When we are full, the hippocampus is thought to quieten down our memories of delicious food, thereby reducing our appetite.When it's disrupted, this control can be seriously undermined.Over the years, extensive research on juvenile
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科學研究相關時事趣聞 2023 All about scientific research.json

chunks.chunk_text: mice has found the function of the hippocampus is very sensitive to junk food, but this has only recently been observed in young and healthy humans.Next article
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科學研究相關時事趣聞 2023 All about scientific research.json

chunks.chunk_text: The findings are based on data gathered from a hunter-gatherer population in Tanzania who wore devices that measured physical activity as well as periods of rest.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科學研究相關時事趣聞 2023 All about scientific research.json

chunks.chunk_text: Asda people appear to lack the markers of chronic diseases associated with long periods of sitting.They believe this is down to the active rest postures used by the tribe.Next articleAboriginal canoe sets out on voyage to Japan for research.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 科學研究相關時事趣聞 2023 All about scientific research.json
